name: focus-flow
title: Focusflow - a Study Clock
description: A Raycast extension to help you Focus on your studies and Flow with your team. Engage with your friends in some friendly competition.
author: Ek217

commands.name: create-team
commands.title: Create a Flow
commands.description: Create a new team to Flow with.

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Focus Menubar
commands.subtitle: FocusFlow
commands.description: Quick access to FocusFlow from your menubar.

commands.name: join-team
commands.title: Join a Flow
commands.description: Join an existing team to Flow with.

commands.name: stop-session
commands.title: Stop a Focus Session
commands.description: Stop tracking and save your Focus time.

commands.name: modify-session
commands.title: Modify Last Session
commands.description: Modify your last completed study session.

commands.name: my-stats
commands.title: My Stats
commands.description: View your personal study statistics and rank.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
